dc:title: The Diabolic Plot
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Points out that many Join the Communist Party with good intentions, such as to better man's human condition, yet many have received no religious training and are not concerned with the Party's anti-religious stance. Gives a short summary of Lenin's attitude toward dealing with Christianity.
